preference.name: AWBBackgroundContextAutoSaveFrequency
preference.preference_description: BackgroundContext object is saved in two ways - one way is via explicit actions like, configuration change and other way is to automatically save it in certain intervals. This preference specifies the frequency (in seconds) for a BackgroundContext object to be automatically saved. If a 0 or negative value is provided, the BackgroundContext will not be saved automatically and will only be saved on explicit actions, like, configuration change. However, BackgroundContext will always be created, irrespective of the value of this preference.
